abstract: When Saudi Prince Alwaleed bin Talal hits New York to check up on his Citigroup stake, he might have another investment to consider. The Telegraph reported Wednesday that Saudi billionaire was rumored to be making a takeover play for InterContinental Hotels Group, whose stately New York flagship, The New York Post notes, is just steps from the Park Avenue headquarters of Citigroup.

The Telegraph reported Wednesday that Saudi billionaire was rumored to be making a takeover play for InterContinental Hotels Group, whose stately New York flagship, The New York Post notes, is just steps from the Park Avenue headquarters of Citigroup.
